articles.title: StatPREP.org
articles.contents:
We are revising our home pages for 2021. Sorry for any inconvenience.
Links to some favorite sites:
Little Apps
Data Science in a Box Mine Çetinkaya-Rundel
Statistics using Technology (2/e) by Kate Kozak
Compact Guide to Classical Inference by Daniel Kaplan
Open Intro Introduction to Modern Statistics by Mine Çetinkaya-Rundel and Johanna Hardin
Modern Dive: Statistical Inference via Data Science, by Chester Ismay and Albert Y Kim
